description: Detects the use of "DumpMinitool.exe" a tool that allows the dump of process memory via the use of the "MiniDumpWriteDump"
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: DumpMinitool Execution
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\DumpMinitool.exe" OR "*\\DumpMinitool.x86.exe" OR "*\\DumpMinitool.arm64.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("DumpMinitool.exe" OR "DumpMinitool.x86.exe" OR "DumpMinitool.arm64.exe"))) AND process.command_line.text:("*\ Full*" OR "*\ Mini*" OR "*\ WithHeap*"))
